title: GTA+
headline: GTA+
subtitle: Arena Workshop and Discounts
content:
GTA+ Members can claim the Arena Workshop for free through September 13.

Members can claim the Arena Workshop for free and bring eligible vehicles to it for 50% off an assortment of Arena Modifications, including Arena Vehicle Armor Plating, Arena War Vehicle Weapons, Arena Bodyworks - Blades, Spikes & Rollcages, Arena Vehicle Vertical Jump, and Arena Boosts.

GTA+ Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel any time. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
button: Select to sign up to GTA+
